Tucson.Bank of America Plaza (Tucson): The Bank of America Plaza is a high-rise office building which was built in 1977 and is located in Downtown Tucson, Arizona. It took over the top spot from the Pima County Legal Services Building, which was the tallest building from 1967-1977. It was the tallest building in Tucson from the time of its completion in 1977 until 1986, when the UniSource Energy Tower was completed.
